data.title: Namma - Metro - A Study
data.meta_description: Namma_Metro - A Study - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document provides a study of the Bangalore Metro project, known as Namma Metro. It summarizes the key issues and stakeholders involved in the project. The document discusses the benefits and limitations of the metro, as well as issues around the planning and alignment of the metro lines. Specifically, it examines the protests that occurred regarding the alignment in the Chinmaya Mission Hospital Road, Lalbagh, and Nanda Theatre Road areas of Bangalore. The study aims to better understand the role of civil society in public participation and decision-making around large infrastructure projects in India.
